GR14sadhdipu:0: This is an interesting text. There appear to be many original verses sprinkled throughout the text, many of which are incomplete. Some of the verses
GR14sadhdipu:1: don't follow any regular meter and some work is needed to edit this text. Some verses are likely quotes, but I haven't been able to trace them.
GR14sadhdipu:2: I have used Haridas Shastri's edition, and have not had access to another.
GR14sadhdipu:3: It would be worth finding other manuscripts in order to produce a true critical

GR14sadhdipu:813: tuṣṭiryā bhavatas tataḥ śataguṇāṃ rādhā-nideśān mayā
GR14sadhdipu:814: naste'smin puratas tvam arpaya hare ramyopahāre ratim ||
GR14sadhdipu:817: ādaṃ mātṛ-mude bhaved api yathā paktrī-mano-rañjanā |
GR14sadhdipu:818: tān sarvān saha-bhojinaḥ sarasayā vācā sahan hāsayan bhuñjadhvaṃ na parityajan kim apīty ekāntam āhlādayan ||
GR14sadhdipu:819: annaṃ vyañjanavat kiyat kiyad adaṃś cakre'nnavad vyañjanaṃ paryāptaṃ na tathāpi lālasatayā vābhūd anuvyañjanam |
GR14sadhdipu:820: pratyekaṃ ca tad iṣṭa-piṣṭaka-kulaṃ tāṃ gorasānāṃ bhidām
GR14sadhdipu:821: ekaikāṃ ca kṛtābhinandanam adan saṃpipriye sarvadā ||
GR14sadhdipu:822: pūjakas tu śītala-jalādi samarpya mandirān nirgatya niyama-japādi kuryāt |
GR14sadhdipu:824: niyamānte ca vidhivad ghaṇṭādi-vādyaṃ kṛtvā śrī-mandire praviśya tato jala-
GR14sadhdipu:848: ya idaṃ śraddhayā devi paśyen mantrī subhaktimān |
GR14sadhdipu:849: sa sarva-kāmān labhate bhaktiṃ tat-pādayoḥ parām ||
GR14sadhdipu:854: tato ratna-khaṭṭopari śayyādi-racanaṃ tatra bhāva-yuktena manasā śayanaṃ kārayet
GR14sadhdipu:855: tataḥ sevāyāṃ mukhyo'dhikārī pūjaka-pācakādi-sarvāṃs tathākiñcanān vaiṣṇavān ānīya tair militvā mahā-prasādasya mahad-bhaktyā ca-
GR14sadhdipu:856: anādi purato nyastaṃ cakṣuṣā gṛhyate mayā |
GR14sadhdipu:860: śrī-govindas tat prasādaś caraṇāmṛtam eva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:862: sa ca punar madhyamādhikāri-guṇam āśritya teṣu vaiṣṇava-vargeṣu yathocita-
GR14sadhdipu:863: maryādā-mārga-rakṣaṇāya kṛpāpekṣā ity ādi-diśā tatra bhagavad-bhaktāya ca
GR14sadhdipu:864: vastrādi-vārṣikaṃ dattvā sneha-yuktena śrī-śrī-sevāyāṃ sāvadhānaṃ kṛtavān |
GR14sadhdipu:865: tataḥ sarve pūjakādayaḥ sva-sva-dehādi-vyāpāraṃ kṛtvā śrī-bhagavat-kathā-
GR14sadhdipu:867: tataḥ sarve snānādikaṃ kṛtvā sva-sva-sevāyāṃ sāvadhānā bhavanti |
GR14sadhdipu:868: tato'parāhne vidhivad dvārodghāṭanaṃ kṛtvā śrī-bhagavat-prabodhanaṃ tataḥ
GR14sadhdipu:876: utthāpane dhūpa-dīpaṃ ye paśyanti narā bhuvi |
GR14sadhdipu:877: te yānti paramaṃ viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śāśvatam avyayam ||
GR14sadhdipu:885: tataḥ paśyatāṃ deva-munīndra-manuṣyādīnāṃ gīta-vādyaiḥ saha jaya-jaya-śabdaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:898: ye paśyanti tu te yānti tad-dhāma param avyayam ||
GR14sadhdipu:905: karpūrāvali-nindi cāru-vasanaṃ bibhran-nitambe vahann uṣṇīṣaṃ vara-mūrdhni kāntam aruṇaṃ nidrā-vimiśrekṣaṇam
GR14sadhdipu:906: svīkurvan sukhadaṃ manoratha-karaṃ māṅgalyārātrikaṃ govindaḥ kuśalaṃ karoti bhavato rātry-anta-kāle sadā ||
GR14sadhdipu:914: payasā saṃyutaṃ bhaktaṃ yācate karuṇāmbudhiḥ || iti pūrvaṃ darśitavān |
GR14sadhdipu:929: bibhrāṇaṃ govindaṃ vihasad vadanaṃ kadā paśye ||
GR14sadhdipu:936: uṣṇīṣaṃ dadhad aruṇaṃ dhaṭīṃ vicitrāṃ tad-upari ca bibhrāṇaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:942: ye paśyanti janāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ śayanārātrikaṃ hareḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:943: te tu govinda-devasya kṛpā-pūrṇā na saṃśayaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:955: evam ārātrikaṃ pañca ye paśyanti janā bhuvi ||
GR14sadhdipu:956: te sarve vāñchitaṃ prāpya putraṃ pautraṃ dhanaṃ tathā |
GR14sadhdipu:965: tvaṃ gavām indra ity āder govinda iti kathyate |
GR14sadhdipu:966: tasmād vijaya-govindaṃ budhā evaṃ vadanti hi ||
GR14sadhdipu:967: athavā yasya bhajanāt kāmādy-ari-jayāt tu tam |
GR14sadhdipu:970: mano lagati govinde yasya sandarśanād dhruvam ||
GR14sadhdipu:982: vigraham ānīya kathitavān svayaṃ bhagavatānena mamābhedaṃ jānīhi |
GR14sadhdipu:988: tataḥ śrī-kāśīśvaro daṇḍavat praṇamya gaura-govinda-vigrahaṃ śrī-vṛndāvnaaṃ prāpitavān
GR14sadhdipu:992: ato yathā śrī-govindasya sevā-vidhiḥ śrī-mahāprabhor api tathā grantha-vistāra-bhiyā vistārya na likhyate |
GR14sadhdipu:1003: yad vācā vṛkṣa-latāḥ kāle'kāle puṣpitāḥ syuḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1005: karṇa-dvandvaṃ ca dīpte puraṭa-viracite kuṇḍale hāri-hīre |
GR14sadhdipu:1006: niṣkaṃ kāñcīṃ suhārān bhuja-kaṭaka-tulākoṭikādīṃś ca vande vṛndāṃ vṛndāvanāntaḥ surucira-vasanāṃ śrīla-govinda-pārśve ||
GR14sadhdipu:1009: vaktavyaṃ cātra kiṃ vā yad anubhajanato durlabhe deva-lokaiḥ
GR14sadhdipu:1011: asyāḥ sva-prājñā likhyate - ekadā rātrau suptaṃ śrīmat-prabhuṃ
GR14sadhdipu:1019: bhaktānāṃ vyadadhan mahotsavam ayaṃ netrārbudānāṃ param svīkurvan prathamaṃ sumaṅgalataraṃ snānaṃ ca pañcāmṛtaiḥ ||[*ENDNOTE 5]
GR14sadhdipu:1023: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhava-padma-japa-prabhṛtayaḥ sadyaḥ kṛtārthaṃ gatāḥ
GR14sadhdipu:1026: pītaṃ kañcukam atulaṃ coṣṇīṣaṃ citra-dhaṭīṃ dhṛtaṃ devam |
GR14sadhdipu:1032: teṣu pañca-dineṣu prabhuḥ priyayā sahitaḥ sadā virājate |
GR14sadhdipu:1039: niṣkaṃ kāñcīṃ supada-kaṭakāv aṅgade kaṅkaṇe ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1040: pītaṃ vāsaś catuṣkaṃ maṇi-gaṇa-ghaṭitā mudrikāś cāṅguliṣu bibhrāṇaṃ vāma-pārśve nija-priyatamayā sevitaṃ devam īḍe ||
GR14sadhdipu:1043: niṣkaṃ kāñcī-śalākā yuga-valaya-ghaṭā nūpurān mudrikāś ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1044: śroṇau raktaṃ dukūlaṃ tad-uparama-tulaṃ cāru-nīlaṃ dadhānāṃ divyantīṃ vāma-pārśve vraja-kumuda-vidho rādhikām āśraye'ham ||
GR14sadhdipu:1050: nānā-varṇair gandha-cūrṇaiḥ prapūrṇair ādau bhūr dyau vyānaśe dik vidik ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1054: uccasthe graha-pañcake suraguro sendau navamyāṃ tithau lagne karkaṭake punar vasu-yute meṣaṃ gate pūṣaṇi |
GR14sadhdipu:1055: nirgagdhuṃ nikhilāḥ palāśa-samidho medhyād ayodhyārāme āvirbhūtam abhūd apūrva-vibhavaṃ yat kiñcid ekaṃ mahaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1063: puṣpaiś cūḍāṃ mukuṭam atulaṃ kuṇḍale cāru-hīre
GR14sadhdipu:1065: jānuny ārohayantīṃ bhramara-karṣiṇīṃ bibhrataṃ kāntayānyāṃ nāmnā tāṃ vaijayantīṃ nija-priyatamayā paśya govinda-devam ||
GR14sadhdipu:1066: puṣpaiḥ kuñjāvali-viracanā puṣpa-candrātapaś ca dolā nānā-kusuma-racitā puṣpa-vṛndaiś ca veṇuḥ
GR14sadhdipu:1069: agrataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśve govindaṃ priyayā yutam |
GR14sadhdipu:1072: kāntam āliṅgya hṛṣṭā taiḥ prema-bhaktais tadojjvalaiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1075: iti brahmādayo devā gāyanto divi harṣataḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1079: tāṃ dolikāṃ dolayituṃ samutsukāḥ svāyogyatām etya tato'vatasthire ||
GR14sadhdipu:1080: ye mānavā bhāgya-bhājo divi devās tathaiva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1081: tair dṛṣṭaḥ priyayā yukto govindo dolanotsave ||
GR14sadhdipu:1083: mama kurute mudam atulaṃ vaiśākhī śukla-tṛtīyā śubhadā |
GR14sadhdipu:1093: suvījanaṃ tu kartavyaṃ bhaktair yantrādinā hareḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1111: āyātā sakhi rādhe tava sukhadā śrāvaṇa-tṛtīyeyam |
GR14sadhdipu:1117: yasmin dine prasūyeta devakī tvāṃ janārdana |
GR14sadhdipu:1118: tad dinaṃ brūhi vaikuṇṭha kurmas te tatra cotsavam ||[*ENDNOTE 9]
GR14sadhdipu:1119: sphurati kathaṃ mama satataṃ vāma-netraṃ vicāraya sakhi tvam |
GR14sadhdipu:1121: bhadre tu bhadradā ceyaṃ śrī-harer janmanas tithiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1122: lokato vidhitas tatra cotsavaḥ kriyate budhaiḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1123: nardanto dadhi-dhṛta-kardameṣu bhaktāḥ kūrdantaḥ punar api tat kṣipanta ārāt |
GR14sadhdipu:1130: vandino gāyakāś caiva nartakā vādakāś ca ye |
GR14sadhdipu:1131: divya-veśa-dharās te tu nanṛtuḥ papaṭhur jaguḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1132: gāyanto mṛdu-madhuraṃ vandi-gaṇāḥ paṭhanti bhṛśam uccaiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1133: vṛttiṃ vināpi te te yācante pāritoṣikaṃ tebhyaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1136: bhaktānāṃ vyadadhan mahotsavamayaṃ netrārbudānāṃ paraṃ svīkurvan prathamaṃ sumaṅgalataraṃ snānaṃ ca pañcāmṛtaiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1137: aṣṭamyāṃ sutithau niśārdha-samaye govinda-devo harir yaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhava-padmaja-prabhṛtayaḥ sadyaḥ kṛtārthaṃ gatāḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1140: iti brahmādayo devā gāyanto divi harṣataḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1142: divi deva-gaṇāḥ sarve āgatās tad-dine śubhe |
GR14sadhdipu:1143: tad ye paśyanti tad-rātrau te kṛtārthās tu bhūtale ||
GR14sadhdipu:1144: cakṣuṣmantas tu te proktāḥ prabhoḥ pārśvaṃ vrajanti ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:1147: bhādrapade bhādrapade māsi māsite pakṣe'pakṣepa-rahite hite rasamaye guṇa-gaṇa-
GR14sadhdipu:1148: rohiṇīṃ rohiṇīṃ sarati sudhākare sudhākare yoge yogeśvareśvaro madhye kṣaṇadāyāḥ kṣaṇadāyāḥ pūrṇānandatayā jīvavaj-jananī-jaṭhara-
GR14sadhdipu:1149: saṃbandhābhāvād bandhābhāvāc ca kevalaṃ vilasat-karuṇayāruṇayā tathāvidha-
GR14sadhdipu:1150: līlālī-lāsikayā kayācana purandara-dig-aṅganotsaṅga iva rajanīkaraḥ sva-
GR14sadhdipu:1151: prakāśatayā prādurbhāvam eva bhāvayan agre pūrva-pūrvajani janita-tapaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:1154: svarūpeṇāvirbhāvaṃ bhāvayitvā stanandhayatvābhimānam eva kṣaṇaṃ tayoḥ prakaṭayya paścān nitya-siddha-pitṛ-mātṛ-bhāvayoḥ śrī-nanda-yaśodayor api
GR14sadhdipu:1156: govinda-priya-ramaṇī-gaṇeṣu mukhyā rādheyaṃ trijagati rājate svayaṃ śrīḥ
GR14sadhdipu:1175: cala cala naya naya bho bho govinde copaḍhaukanam |
GR14sadhdipu:1176: divyaṃ paśyāmo mukha-padmaṃ dāsyāmo dīpa-mālikās tatra ||
GR14sadhdipu:1177: iti kṛtvā pragāyanti pralapanti punaḥ punaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1181: yamunāyās taṭe kecit tīrthe kecij jale tathā |
GR14sadhdipu:1194: tair anna-kūṭaṃ saṃsthāpya yathā govardhano giriḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1195: tasya pārśve dhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyañjanādikam uttamam ||
GR14sadhdipu:1199: yad anna-kūṭaṃ saṃvīkṣya santuṣṭo bhavati prabhuḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1201: prabhor agre tu tat kūṭaṃ ye paśyanti narā bhuvi ||
GR14sadhdipu:1202: bhāgya-bhājas tu te loke triṣu lokeṣu durlabhāḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1205: mahad-ārātrikaṃ nāma ye paśyanti janā bhuvi ||
GR14sadhdipu:1206: teṣāṃ bhāgyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sahasra-vadanair api |
GR14sadhdipu:1208: mahad-bhogaṃ bhuri kṛtvā cānte vaikuṇṭham āpnuyuḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1209: prasādam anna-kūṭasya ye janāḥ param ādarāt |
GR14sadhdipu:1212: svalaṅkṛtānāṃ tu gavāṃ pūjā kāryā tataḥ śubhā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1214: barhāpīḍaṃ naṭavara-vapuḥ karṇayoḥ karṇikāraṃ bibhrad-vāsaḥ kanaka-kapiśaṃ vaijayantīṃ ca mālām |
GR14sadhdipu:1218: gopāṣṭmyāṃ tu devasya ye paśyanti harer mukham |
GR14sadhdipu:1219: dūrān naśyanti pāpāni tasmin bhaktiś ca jāyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:1220: dhyāyed govinda-devaṃ nava-ghana-madhuraṃ divya-līlāṃ naṭantam ity ādi
GR14sadhdipu:1223: prabodhanyās tu govindaṃ ye paśyanti priyāyutam |
GR14sadhdipu:1234: samabhāgaṃ tu kiñcid vā viṣamaṃ parikalpitam ||
GR14sadhdipu:1236: hiṅguṃ trijātaṃ maricaṃ lavaṇaṃ cādrakaṃ tathā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1239: yathāyogyaṃ tu tair dravyaiḥ pacyate bahu-yatnataḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1246: yad dṛṣṭvā bhojanāt kṛṣṇo jāyate hy atiharṣitaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1247: prabhor harṣāt tu bhaktānām atiharṣaiḥ prajāyate |
GR14sadhdipu:1251: bhajanād yasya nityatvaṃ nityatve tasya kā kathā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1252: draṣṭuṃ na yogyā vaktuṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu te'dhamāḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1259: rāgaḥ saptasu hanta ṣaṭsv api śiśor aṅgeṣv alaṃ tuṅgatā vistāras triṣu kharvatā triṣu punar gambhīratā ca triṣu |
GR14sadhdipu:1260: dairghyaṃ pañcasu kiṃ ca pañcasu sakhe saṃprekṣyate sūkṣmatā dvātriṃśad-vara-lakṣaṇaḥ katham asau gopeṣu sambhāvyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:1261: rāga iti vrajeśvaraṃ prati kvacit tat-sama-vayaso gopasya vākyam idam |
GR14sadhdipu:1284: avatārā hy asaṅkhyātāḥ kathitā me tavāgrataḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1285: paraṃ samyak pravakṣyāmi kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayam ||
GR14sadhdipu:1286: devānāṃ kārya-siddhy-artham ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaiva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1288: yair eva jñāyate devo bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1289: tāny ahaṃ veda nānyo'pi satyam etan mayoditam ||
GR14sadhdipu:1290: ṣoḍaśaiva tu cihnāni mayā dṛṣṭāni tat-pade |
GR14sadhdipu:1292: dhvajāḥ padmaṃ tathā vajram aṅkuśo yava eva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:1293: svastikaṃ cordhva-rekhā ca aṣṭa-koṇas tathaiva ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:1296: ambaraṃ matsya-cihnaṃ ca goṣpadaṃ saptamaṃ smṛtam |
GR14sadhdipu:1297: aṅkāny etāni bho vidvan dṛśyante tu yadā kadā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1298: kṛṣṇākhyaṃ tu paraṃ brahma bhuvi jātaṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1299: dvayaṃ vātha trayaṃ vātha catvāraḥ pañca eva vā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1301: ṣoḍaśaṃ tu tathā cihnaṃ śṛṇu devarṣi-saptam |
GR14sadhdipu:1327: lalāṭaṃ nāsikā tadvad gulpham ardhāṅgulaṃ bhavet ||
GR14sadhdipu:1329: dvy-aṅgulaṃ cibukaṃ cātha grīvā syāt caturaṅgulā ||
GR14sadhdipu:1330: vakṣo-bhogo bhaved anyas tasmān nābhy-avadhiḥ paraḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1333: pādau ca tat-samāv itthaṃ dairghya-bhāgā navoditāḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1335: tadvad grīvā jānu-pādās tathāpi syur navaiva te ||
GR14sadhdipu:1337: tad yathā idam eva rahasyam-yadyapi tiryaṅ-narādiṣu bhagavato janma,
GR14sadhdipu:1338: tathāpi svecchayā gauḍa-deśe tad-deśīyān brāhmaṇān sarva-śreṣṭhān vijñāya teṣāṃ kule
GR14sadhdipu:1344: sat-kula-prasūtān gauḍīyān brāhmaṇān vinā na sambhavati |
GR14sadhdipu:1346: gauḍīyān iti jñātvā sarvajña-śiromaṇir mahāprabhuḥ śrī-rūpa-sanātanau
GR14sadhdipu:1347: nijāntaraṅgau vijñāpya tayoḥ sarva-śaktiṃ saṃcārya paścima-deśe
GR14sadhdipu:1355: tābhyāṃ ca punaḥ śrī-vṛndāvanaṃ gatvā śrī-śrī-sevādikaṃ parivāre tat samarpitam
GR14sadhdipu:1361: bhāgavatānāṃ maryādā-rakṣaṇa-svabhāvaḥ svayaṃ caite sevā-samaye mandire na praviśanti ca
GR14sadhdipu:1375: ā-ṣoḍaśāc ca kaiśoraṃ yauvanaṃ syāt tataḥ param ||
GR14sadhdipu:1376: aucityāt tatra kaumāraṃ vaktavyaṃ vatsale rase |
GR14sadhdipu:1378: śraiṣṭhyam ujjvala evāsya kaiśorasya tathāpy adaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:1380: ādyaṃ madhyaṃ tathā śeṣaṃ kaiśoraṃ trividhaṃ bhavet ||
GR14sadhdipu:1382: ūru-dvayasya bāhvoś ca kāpi śrīr urasas tathā |
GR14sadhdipu:1383: mūrter mādhurimādyaṃ ca kaiśore sati madhyame ||
GR14sadhdipu:1390: tri-jagan-mohanaṃ gītam ity ādir iha mādhurī ||
GR14sadhdipu:1394: hares taruṇimāṅkure sphurati mādhurī kāpy abhūt ||
GR14sadhdipu:1397: ṭīkā śrīmaj-jīva-gosvāmi-caraṇānāṃ madhye śeṣa-vayasa-prāyaḥ sarvatra samānatvam |
GR14sadhdipu:1399: vyaktālakta-padaiḥ kvacit pariluṭhat-piñchāvataṃsaiḥ kvacit talpair vicyuta-kāñcibhiḥ kvacid asau vyākīrṇa-kuñjotkarā |
GR14sadhdipu:1408: tad-vakṣo-ruha-citra-keli-makarī-pāṇḍitya-pāraṃ gataḥ kaiśoraṃ saphalī-karoti kalayan kuñje vihāraṃ hariḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:1413: antaḥpuras tu devasya madhye pūryā manoharam |

GR14sadhdipu:2108: madhyāhne cātha naktaṃ vilasati vipine rādhayāddhāparāhne goṣṭhaṃ yāti pradoṣe ramayati suhṛdo yah sa kṛṣṇo'vatān naḥ || 2 ||
GR14sadhdipu:2110: padyair hṛdyair ahṛdyair api sukha-śayanād utthitau tau sakhībhiḥ |

GR14sadhdipu:2115: susnātaṃ kṛta-bhojanaṃ sahacarais tāṃ cātha taṃ cāśraye || 4 ||

GR14sadhdipu:2128: sakhyānīteśa-śeṣāśana-mudita-hṛdaṃ tāṃ ca taṃ ca vrajendum |

GR14sadhdipu:2130: nirvyūḍhosrāli-dohaṃ sva-gṛham anu punar bhuktavantaṃ smarāmi || 8 ||
GR14sadhdipu:2132: kṛṣṇaṃ gopaiḥ sabhāyāṃ vihitaguṇikalālokanaṃ snigdhamātrā yatnādānīya saṃśāyitamatha nibhṛtaṃ prāptakuñjaṃ smarāmi || 9 ||

GR14sadhdipu:2173: te te prabhāva-nicayā vihitāś ca yena

GR14sadhdipu:3420: aṃ āṃ iṃ īṃ uṃ ūṃ ṛṃ ṝṃ ṃ ṃ eṃ aiṃ oṃ auṃ aṃ aḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3428: iti pūrvaṃ kṛtvā guru-mantra-devatānām aikyaṃ vibhāvya mantra-japaṃ kuryāt
GR14sadhdipu:3438: siddhir bhavatu me devi prasīda śrī-rameśvarī ||
GR14sadhdipu:3443: yasmin kṛte bhavet siddhiḥ pañcākṣara-manor dhruvam ||1||
GR14sadhdipu:3448: āvāhanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca sannidhāpanam eva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:3451: atha dīpaṃ samānīya sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tathā ||9||
GR14sadhdipu:3452: tāmraṃ kāṃsyam ayaṃ cāpi mṛn-mayaṃ śubha-lakṣaṇam |
GR14sadhdipu:3467: pradīpe pūjayet tasmin svayaṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam ||17||
GR14sadhdipu:3468: sanātanāya svayaṃ jyotiṣe nama ity añjaliṃ kṣipet |
GR14sadhdipu:3472: akhaṇḍām eva tāṃ kuryād yāvat pañca-dināvadhi ||19||
GR14sadhdipu:3475: vāmāṃ pañcadaśaiḥ sūtrair dakṣiṇāṃ ṣoḍaśair api |
GR14sadhdipu:3485: yad yad hṛdi sthitaṃ vāpi nālabhyaṃ bhuvana-traye |
GR14sadhdipu:3487: ante ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dīpaṃ visarjayet |
GR14sadhdipu:3488: putrārthī putram āpnoti dhanārthī labhate dhanam ||27|| ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:3496: kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā pauṣe vā māgha-māsake |
GR14sadhdipu:3499: nanda-grāmaṃ ca saṅketaṃ vara-sānuṃ giriṃ tathā ||4||
GR14sadhdipu:3501: eṣām anyatamaṃ sthānaṃ samāśritya vidhir bhavet ||5||
GR14sadhdipu:3514: kṛṣṇāyāś caiva śuklāyā dhenor ājyaṃ nidhāpayet |
GR14sadhdipu:3516: kṛtvā mātṛkayā cājyaṃ vartikāṃ tatra vinyaset |
GR14sadhdipu:3517: grāmotthaṃ ca tulaṃ varṇau kāryārambhe prakalpayet ||13||
GR14sadhdipu:3518: sthāpayitvā ghṛte samyak karṣaṇīṃ tatra tan-mayīm |
GR14sadhdipu:3528: gopālī pālikā caiva dhyāna-niṣṭhā tathaiva ca |
GR14sadhdipu:3529: somābhā tārakā caiva śaivyā padmā ca bhadrikā ||19||
GR14sadhdipu:3531: yonimudrāṃ tato vadhvā praṇamet sādaraṃ mune ||20||
GR14sadhdipu:3533: kalāṃ candrakalāṃ candrāṃ tathā capalatāṃ punaḥ ||21||
GR14sadhdipu:3534: pramodāṃ padminīṃ pūrṇāṃ paramāṃ subhagāṃ śubhām |
GR14sadhdipu:3538: maṇḍinīṃ maṇḍalā-mukhyāṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ ca bhāminīm |
GR14sadhdipu:3547: rocinīṃ suruciṃ śobhāṃ śubhrāṃ śobhāvatīṃ sabhām ||28||
GR14sadhdipu:3548: rohitāṃ lohitāṃ līlāṃ śīlāṃ caiva saśīlikām |
GR14sadhdipu:3550: sudatīṃ sumukhīṃ vyomāṃ somāṃ sāmāṃ tvarāturām |
GR14sadhdipu:3552: prabhāvatīṃ premagāṃ ca kṣemāṃ kṣemāvatīṃ kṣamām |
GR14sadhdipu:3553: mañjarīṃ khañjarīṭāṃ ca lakṣaṇāṃ ca sulakṣaṇām ||31||
GR14sadhdipu:3554: kāmāṃ kāmavatīṃ vīṇāṃ hīnāṃ vīṇākarāṃ talām |
GR14sadhdipu:3557: gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dūpair dīpair naivedyakais tathā ||33||
GR14sadhdipu:3560: mādhavaṃ citralekhaṃ ca śāradaṃ ca vibhāvasum ||34||
GR14sadhdipu:3568: dīpasya dakṣa-bhāge tu nandaṃ caiva yaśodikāṃ ||38||
GR14sadhdipu:3569: vāme sampūjayet kīrtiṃ vṛṣabhānuṃ ca gopakam |
GR14sadhdipu:3571: dīpaṃ pañca-dinaṃ vāpi kuryād daśa-dinaṃ tathā |
GR14sadhdipu:3572: pakṣaṃ vā rakṣayed dīpaṃ māsaṃ vāpi munīśvara ||40||
GR14sadhdipu:3576: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhiṃ sadyaḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ||42||
GR14sadhdipu:3578: pūjanād eva dīpasya nāsādhyaṃ vidyate kvacit ||43||
GR14sadhdipu:3582: tasya sarvārtha-siddhiḥ syāt kṛṣṇaṃ paśyati tat-kṣaṇāt ||
GR14sadhdipu:3583: hrīṃ hrīṃ klīṃ brūṃ saḥ kṛṣṇa-priye hrāṃ hrīṃ klīṃ svāhā |
GR14sadhdipu:3635: vrajeśvari vrajādhipe śrī rādhike namo'stu te ||12||
GR14sadhdipu:3640: rākāyāṃ ca sitāṣṭamyāṃ daśamyāṃ ca viśuddha-dhīḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3641: ekādaśyāṃ trayodaśyāṃ yaḥ paṭhet sa svayaṃ śivaḥ ||14||
GR14sadhdipu:3642: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tam āpnoti sādhakaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3645: rādhā-kuṇḍa-jale sthitā yaḥ paṭhet sādhakaḥ śatam ||16||
GR14sadhdipu:3646: tasya sarvārtha-siddhiḥ syād vāk-sāmarthyaṃ tathā labhet |
GR14sadhdipu:3647: aiśvaryaṃ ca labhet sākṣād dṛśā paśyati rādhikām ||17||
GR14sadhdipu:3648: tena sa tat-kṣaṇād eva tuṣṭā datte mahāvaram |
GR14sadhdipu:3651: ataḥ parataraṃ prārthyaṃ vaiṣṇavasya na vidyate ||19||
GR14sadhdipu:3655: yad gopitaṃ tvayā pūrvaṃ tantrādau yāmalādiṣu |
GR14sadhdipu:3657: tan mahyaṃ brūhi deveśa yady ahaṃ tava vallabhā |
GR14sadhdipu:3661: yac ca kasmaicid ākhyātuṃ gopitaṃ bhuvana-traye ||3||
GR14sadhdipu:3663: vāgīśaś ca hayagrīvo devarṣiś caiva nāradaḥ ||4||
GR14sadhdipu:3665: brahmā yasya prasādena trailokyaṃ racayet kṣaṇāt ||5||
GR14sadhdipu:3672: rādhikā pātu me śīrṣaṃ vṛṣabhānu-sutā śikhām |
GR14sadhdipu:3673: bhālaṃ pātu sadā gopī netre govinda-vallabhā ||9||
GR14sadhdipu:3674: nāsāṃ rakṣatu ghoṣeśī vrajeśī pātu karṇayoḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3675: gaṇḍau pātu rati-krīḍā oṣṭhau rakṣatu gopikā ||10||
GR14sadhdipu:3676: dantān rakṣatu gāndharvī jihvāṃ rakṣatu bhāminī |
GR14sadhdipu:3678: bāhū me pātu gopeśī pādau me gopa-sundarī |
GR14sadhdipu:3686: mūlādhāraṃ sadā pātu śrīṃ klīṃ saubhāgya-vardhinī |
GR14sadhdipu:3687: aiṃ klīṃ śrī-rādhike svāhā svādhiṣṭhānaṃ sadāvatu ||16||
GR14sadhdipu:3688: klāṃ klīṃ namo rādhikāyai maṇipūraṃ sadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3689: lakṣmī māyā smaro rādhā pātu cittam anāhatam ||17||
GR14sadhdipu:3690: klāṃ klīṃ kāmakalā rādhā viśuddhaṃ sarvadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3691: ājñāṃ rakṣatu rādhā me haṃsaḥ klīṃ vahni-vallabhā ||18||
GR14sadhdipu:3692: oṃ namo rādhikāyai svāhā sahasrāraṃ sadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3693: aṣṭādaśākṣarī rādhā sarva-deśe tu pātu mām ||19||
GR14sadhdipu:3694: navārṇā pātu mām ūrdhvaṃ daśārṇāvatu saṃsadi |
GR14sadhdipu:3698: aṣṭākṣarī ca rādhā māṃ rātrau rakṣatu sarvadā |
GR14sadhdipu:3699: pūrṇā pañcadaśī rādhā pātu māṃ vraja-maṇḍale ||22||
GR14sadhdipu:3700: ity evaṃ rādhikāyās te kavadaṃ kīrtitaṃ mayā |
GR14sadhdipu:3703: abhaktāyāpi putrāya dattvā mṛtyuṃ labhen naraḥ ||24||
GR14sadhdipu:3704: nātaḥ parataraṃ divyaṃ kavacaṃ bhuvi vidyate |
GR14sadhdipu:3705: paṭhitvā kavacaṃ paścād yugalaṃ pūjayen naraḥ ||25||
GR14sadhdipu:3708: aṣṭottara-śataṃ japtvā sākṣād devo bhavet svayam |
GR14sadhdipu:3709: kṛṣṇa-premāṇam apy āśu durlabhaṃ labhate dhruvam ||27||
GR14sadhdipu:3710: iti śrī-saṃmohana-tantre śrī-rādhāyās trailokya-vikramaṃ nāma kavacaṃ sampūrṇam |
GR14sadhdipu:3717: lākṣā-varmita-māhavopakaraṇair ebhir vijityākhilaṃ śrī-rādhā-caraṇa-dvayaṃ sukaṭakaṃ sāmrājya-lakṣmyā babhau ||
GR14sadhdipu:3726: lasanti yā yāḥ kusumāni tāsāṃ smita-cchalāt kintu bahiḥ skhalanti ||
GR14sadhdipu:3730: tāmbūlāsyoru-bindu-stavakita-cibukā kajjalākṣī sucitrā rādhālaktojjvalāṅghriḥ sphuriti tilakinī ṣoḍaśā-kalpinīyam ||
GR14sadhdipu:3734: hārās tārānukāra bhuja-kaṭaka-tulākoṭayo ratna-k ptās tuṅgā pādāṅgurīya-cchavir iti ravibhir bhūṣaṇair bhāti rādhā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3736: so'yam vasanta-samayaḥ yasmin purṇaṃ tam iśvaram upoḍha-navānurāgam |
GR14sadhdipu:3740: pūrva-rāgas tathā mānaḥ prema-vaicittyam ity api |
GR14sadhdipu:3750: pravāsāt saṅgate kānte bhogaḥ sampanna īritaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3751: dvidhā syād āgatiḥ prādurbhāvaś ceti sa saṅgamaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3757: vinā viyogaṃ saṃyogaṃ yā tūryam udagād yataḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3759: aṭati yad bhavān ahni kānanaṃ truṭir yugāyate tvām apaśyatām |
GR14sadhdipu:3760: kuṭila-kuntalaṃ śrī-mukhaṃ ca te jaḍa udīkṣitāṃ pakṣma-kṛt dṛśām || iti
GR14sadhdipu:3768: yad-vāñchayā śrīr lalanācarat tapo vihāya kāmān suciraṃ dhṛta-vratā ity ādeḥ śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:3771: tat tu madhura-rasaṃ vinā na sambhavati |
GR14sadhdipu:3777: ratir vāsanayā svādvī bhāsate kāpi kasyacit ||
GR14sadhdipu:3780: pṛthag eva bhakti-rasa-rāṭ sa vistareṇocyate madhuraḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3781: iti hetor gaura-līlāyām api tathaiva śrī-rādhā-gadādharasyaivānugatye
GR14sadhdipu:3784: nanu śrī-gadādharasya rādhātve śrī-gaurasya govindatve kiṃ pramāṇam iti cet tatrāha-yathā svayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya para-brahmatvaṃ, gūḍhaṃ paraṃ brahma manuṣya-liṅgam ity ādeḥ, tato'pi gūḍhataraṃ śacīnandanasya, tato gūḍhatamaṃ preyasīnām |
GR14sadhdipu:3792: dharmaṃ mahā-puruṣa pāsi yugānuvṛttaṃ channaḥ kalau yad abhavas tri-yugo'tha sa tvam ||
GR14sadhdipu:3801: preyasīnāṃ parama-śaktitvam atīva-gūḍhatvāt muninā tatra tatra noktaṃ āptaiḥ khalu svāntaraṅgān prati tad-dvārātidhanyān prati kṛpayā prakaṭitam eva |
GR14sadhdipu:3805: śrī rādhā prema-rūpā yā purā vṛndāvaneśvarī |
GR14sadhdipu:3808: iyam eva lalitaiva rādhikālī na khalu gadādhara eṣa bhūsurendraḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3809: harir ayam athavā svayaiva śaktyā tritayam abhūt sva-sakhī ca rādhikā ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:3817: tāṅ sabāra caraṇe mora sahasra praṇati ||
GR14sadhdipu:3822: teṅho lakṣmī-rūpā tāṅra sama keho nāñi ||
GR14sadhdipu:3847: vilasati kila sā śrī-rādhikeha svayaṃ śrīḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3848: saundarya-lakṣmīr ihakādhya lakṣmīḥ saṅgīta-lakṣmīś ca harer mude'sti ||
GR14sadhdipu:3852: vidhāsye kuñjādau vividha-varivasyāḥ sarabhasaṃ rahaḥ śrī-rūpākhya-priyatama-janasyaiva caramaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:3854: avani-sura-varaḥ śrī-paṇḍitākhyo yatīndraḥ sa khalu bhavati rādhā śrīla-gaurāvatāre |
GR14sadhdipu:3856: prabhu-nija-dayitānāṃ tac ca sāraṃ mataṃ me || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:3860: śrī-sarakāra-ṭhakkureṇa bhajanāmṛte-iha mataṃ me, yathā kali-yuga-
GR14sadhdipu:3871: sa me diśatu bhāvukaṃ prabhu-gadādharaḥ śrī-guruḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3875: ucce samīpa-śayitaḥ prabhuṇā rajanyāṃ nirmālyam etad urasi prasāryam ebhyaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3876: itthaṃ sa yad yad adadāt pramadena yasmai yasmai janāya tad idaṃ sa gadādharo'pi |
GR14sadhdipu:3877: prātar dadau satatam ullasitāya tasmai tasmai mahāprabhu-vimukta-mahā-prasādam ||
GR14sadhdipu:3879: aṅgeṣu tasya parito jayati sma nityaṃ sotkaṇṭham atra sa gadādhara-paṇḍitāgrataḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3881: śrīvāsas tad anu gadādharaṃ babhāṣe bhaṭṭādyaṃ sakalam amutra nīyatāṃ tat |
GR14sadhdipu:3882: ity uktaḥ sa ca sakalaṃ nināya tatra premārdro niravadhi vismṛtātma-ceṣṭaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:3888: niśi tadīya-samīpa-gataḥ sthiraḥ śayanam utsuka eva karoti saḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:3894: praviṣṭo gāyadbhir laghu laghu mṛdaṅge mukharite tathā tālair mānair naṭana-kalayā tatra vibhavau
GR14sadhdipu:3897: janair bhūyo bhūyaḥ sukha-jaladhi-magnair vinimiṣaiḥ samantād āsede jaḍima-jaḍimāṅgaiḥ kim amṛtam ||
GR14sadhdipu:3903: akhila brahma-para veda upara, nā jāne pāṣaṇḍī mati-bhorā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3904: nitya nityānanda caitanya govinda paṇḍita gadādhara rādhe |
GR14sadhdipu:3905: caitanya yugala-rūpa kevala rasera kūpa avatāra sadā-śiva sādhe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3906: antare nava-ghana bāhire gaura-tanu yugala-rūpa parakāśe |
GR14sadhdipu:3907: kahe vāsudeva ghoṣa yugala-bhajana-rase janame janame rahu āśe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3908: gaurāṅga vihara-i parama ānande nityānanda kari saṅge gaṅgā-pulina-raṅge hari hari bole nija-vṛnde |
GR14sadhdipu:3909: kāṅcā kāñcana-maṇi gorā-rūpa tāhe jini ḍagamagi-prema-taraṅga |
GR14sadhdipu:3910: o nava kusuma-dāma gale dole anupāma helana narahari aṅga ||
GR14sadhdipu:3911: bhāve bharala tanu pulaka kadamba janu garaha-i yaichana siṃhe |
GR14sadhdipu:3912: priya gadādhara dhariyā se bāma kara nija-guṇa-gāna govinde ||
GR14sadhdipu:3913: aruṇa-nayana-koṇe īṣat hāsiyā khene royata kibā abhilāṣa |
GR14sadhdipu:3914: soṅari se saba khelā śrī-vṛndāvana-rasa-līlā ki bolaba vāsudeva ghoṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3929: ki rasera dāna cāhe gorā dvija-maṇi |
GR14sadhdipu:3931: dāna deha bali ghane ghane ḍāke |
GR14sadhdipu:3934: se bhāva paḍila mane vāsudeva gāna ||
GR14sadhdipu:3938: gorā-aṅge keho keho jala pheli māre |
GR14sadhdipu:3942: gaurāṅga cāṅdera līlā kahana nā yāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3947: priya gadādhara saṅge gorā khele pāśā sāri |
GR14sadhdipu:3948: khelite lāgila pāśā hāri jini kari ||
GR14sadhdipu:3951: dui jane magana bhela nava pāśā rase |
GR14sadhdipu:3952: jaya jaya diyā gāya vāsudeva ghoṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3955: priya pāriṣada gaṇa gorā guṇa gāya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3956: āni salila keha dhari nija kare |
GR14sadhdipu:3958: cāṅda jiniyā mukha adhika kari sāje |
GR14sadhdipu:3964: phulera samara gorāra paḍi gela mane ||
GR14sadhdipu:3970: sahacara mili phāgu māre gorā gāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3971: candana picakā bhari keho keho dhāya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3974: hari buli bhuja tuli nāce haridāsa |
GR14sadhdipu:3977: rādhā rādhā bali gaurā loṭāya dharaṇī ||
GR14sadhdipu:3980: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe gorā cāṅda bhūme gaḍi yāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3983: kahe vāsu gorā mora baḍa utarola ||
GR14sadhdipu:3984: gaurāṅga viraha jvara hiyā chaṭa phaṭa kare jīvane nā bāṅdhaye thehā |
GR14sadhdipu:3985: nā heriyā cāṅda mukha vidarite cāhe buka kemana karite cāhe nehā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3986: prāṇera hari hari kaha more jīvana upāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3987: e dukhe dukhita ye e dukha jānaye se āra āmi nivediba kāya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3988: gaurāṅga mukhera hāsi sudhā khase rāśi rāśi tāhā āmi nā pāi dekhite |
GR14sadhdipu:3989: yata chila bandhu gaṇa sabhe bhela nikaruṇa āmi jīye ki sukha khāite ||
GR14sadhdipu:3990: gadādhara ādi kari nā dekhiyā prāṇe mari
GR14sadhdipu:3992: ye more karita dayā se gela niṭhura hañā vāsu kene nā gela mariyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3998: pārṣadaiś ca śrīman-nityānandādvaita-śrīvāsaṃ kṛtvā kalau śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-mahāprabhuḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4002: hlādinī-sāra-rūpā sarva-lakṣmī svarūpā-śrī-vṛṣabhānu-nandinī śrīmatī rādhaiva śrī-gopī-gaṇa-mahiṣī-gaṇa-lakṣmī-gaṇaiḥ svaysa kāya-vyūha-prakāśa-rūpaiḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4005: śaktiś ca aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-paṭīyasī yogamāyā vaibhavena yadā yad icchāṃ karoti tat kim api durghaṭaṃ na bhavati avatīrya saṅkīrtanānandāveśena tat tat pūrva-
GR14sadhdipu:4026: hāte laḍi kāṅkhe ḍāli neta paridhāna |
GR14sadhdipu:4028: ḍāki bole haridāsa ke saba tomarā |
GR14sadhdipu:4037: jijñāsāra kāja nāhi jhāṭa tumi naḍa ||
GR14sadhdipu:4038: advaita bolaye eta vicāra ki kāja |
GR14sadhdipu:4040: nṛtya gīte pīta baḍa āmāra ṭhākura |
GR14sadhdipu:4046: gadādhara nṛtya dekhi āche kona jana |
GR14sadhdipu:4049: pṛthivī ha-iyā sikta dhanya hena māne ||
GR14sadhdipu:4054: ye gāya ye dekhe sabhe bhāsilena prema |
GR14sadhdipu:4055: caitanya prasāde keho bāhya nāhi jāne ||
GR14sadhdipu:4056: hari hari boli kāṅde saba vaiṣṇava maṇḍala |
GR14sadhdipu:4065: se ārti dekhite sarva hṛdaya vidare |
GR14sadhdipu:4066: ke ki balibeka prabhu bādha nāhi sphure ||
GR14sadhdipu:4070: āpana hṛdaya prabhu cire naka diyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4072: ārti dekhi gadādhara mane ta vicāre ||
GR14sadhdipu:4073: ei āsibena kṛṣṇa sthira hao khāni |
GR14sadhdipu:4075: baḍa tuṣṭa hailā āi gadādhara prati |
GR14sadhdipu:4076: emata śiśura buddhi nāhi āra kati ||
GR14sadhdipu:4077: muñi bhaye nāhi pāro sammukha ha-ite |
GR14sadhdipu:4078: śiśu ha-i kemane prabodhilā bhāla mate ||
GR14sadhdipu:4079: āi bole bāpa tumi sarvadā thākibā |
GR14sadhdipu:4080: chāḍiyā uhāra saṅga kothāha nā yābā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4082: prabhu bole kon jana gṛhera bhitara |
GR14sadhdipu:4088: āmāra se hena janma gela vṛthā rase |
GR14sadhdipu:4089: nā pāila amūlya nidhi dīna-hīna doṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:4091: ei saba adbhuta sei navadvīpe haye |
GR14sadhdipu:4092: tathāpi o bhakta ba-i anya nā jānaye ||
GR14sadhdipu:4098: anyera ki dāya viṣṇu pūjite nā pāre ||
GR14sadhdipu:4099: snāna kari baise prabhu śrī-viṣṇu pūjite |
GR14sadhdipu:4100: prema jale sakala śrī-aṅga vastra tite ||
GR14sadhdipu:4101: bāhira ha-iyā prabhu se vastra chāḍiyā |
GR14sadhdipu:4102: puna anya vastra pari viṣṇu pūje giyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4103: puna premānanda jale tite se vasana |
GR14sadhdipu:4105: ei mata vastra parivarta kare mātra |
GR14sadhdipu:4106: preme viṣṇu pūjite nā pāre tila mātra ||
GR14sadhdipu:4108: tumi viṣṇu pūja mora nāhika saubhāgya ||
GR14sadhdipu:4117: ihā kahibāre śakti īśvare se dhare ||
GR14sadhdipu:4121: atibaḍa pāṣaṇḍī se vigraha dekhi bhule ||
GR14sadhdipu:4130: duṅhu bole āji haila locana nirmala |
GR14sadhdipu:4131: duṅhu bole janma āji āmāra saphala ||
GR14sadhdipu:4132: bāhya jñāna nāhi duṅhu prabhura śarīre |
GR14sadhdipu:4133: duṅhu prabhu bhāse nija ānanda sāgare ||
GR14sadhdipu:4137: ekera apriya āre sambhāṣā nā kare ||
GR14sadhdipu:4141: dekhā jo nā dena tāre paṇḍita gosāñi ||
GR14sadhdipu:4142: tabe dui prabhu sthira ha-i eka-sthāne |
GR14sadhdipu:4149: ki bhojane ki śayane kibā paryaṭane |
GR14sadhdipu:4153: gadādhara vākye mātra prabhu sukhī haya |
GR14sadhdipu:4156: ei mata prabhu priya gadādhara saṅge |
GR14sadhdipu:4157: tān mukhe bhāgavata kathā śune raṅge ||
GR14sadhdipu:4166: aśru kampa hāsya mūrcchā pulaka huṅkāra |
GR14sadhdipu:4171: śunile nā thāke bāhya nāce sei kṣaṇe ||
GR14sadhdipu:4173: ye nā māne bhāgavata se yavana sama |
GR14sadhdipu:4174: tāra śāstā āche prabhu janme janme yama ||
GR14sadhdipu:4176: sei rātri tathāha thāki tabe āra dine |
GR14sadhdipu:4177: gṛhe āilena prabhu lakṣmī devī sane ||
GR14sadhdipu:4188: citte laya yadi tabe karaha sarvathā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4191: tomāra kanyāra yogya sei divya pati |
GR14sadhdipu:4195: śuni vipra patnī ādi āpta-varga sahe |
GR14sadhdipu:4196: lāgila karite yukti ke budhi ki kahe ||
GR14sadhdipu:4197: sabhe bulilena āra ki kārya vicāre |
GR14sadhdipu:4198: sarvathā e karma giyā karaha satvare ||
GR14sadhdipu:4203: ye sukha pāilā tāhā ke pāre barṇite ||
GR14sadhdipu:4211: tabe śubha kṣaṇe prabhu sakala maṅgale |
GR14sadhdipu:4212: putra vadhū gṛhe ānilena harṣa ha-iyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4216: bhagavānera bhakta yata śrīvāsa pradhāna tāṅ'-sabhāra pāda-padme sahasra praṇāma advaita ācārya prabhura aṃśa-avatāra
GR14sadhdipu:4219: tāṅra pāda-padma vando yāṅra muñi dāsa
GR14sadhdipu:4223: tāṅhāra padāravinde ananta praṇāma tathā hi tatraiva -
GR14sadhdipu:4234: tāṅra upaśākhā kichu kari ye gaṇana paṇḍitera gaṇa saba bhāgavata dhanya prāṇa-vallabha sabāra śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya
GR14sadhdipu:4235: ei tina skandhera kailuṅ śākhāra gaṇana
GR14sadhdipu:4239: ataeva tāṅ-sabāra vandiye caraṇa caitanya-mālīra kahi līlā-anukrama
GR14sadhdipu:4241: caṇḍī-dāsa vidyāpati rāyera nāṭaka gīti karṇāmṛta śrī gīta govinda mahāprabhu rātri dine svarūpa-rāmānandera sane nāce gāya parama ānanda
GR14sadhdipu:4242: purī gosāñira vātsalya mukhya rāmānandera śuddha sakhya govindādyera śuddha dāsya rase gadādhara jagadānanda svarūpera mukhya rasānanda ei cāri bhāve prabhu vaśa
GR14sadhdipu:4248: kathanādhikāritvena ca tena sa ca nirūpitaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4258: tumi viṣṇu pūja mora nāhika se bhāgya ||
GR14sadhdipu:4262: tatra ca śrī-vṛndāvane śrī-śrī-sevādhikāras tu pūrvaṃ likhito'sti |
GR14sadhdipu:4266: kṣetra-sannyāsa nā chāḍiha prabhu niṣedhilā paṇḍita kahe yāhāṅ tumi sei nīlācala
GR14sadhdipu:4268: prabhu kahe iṅhā kara gopīnātha sevana paṇḍita kahe koṭi-sevā tvat-pāda-darśana
GR14sadhdipu:4269: prabhu kahe sevā chāḍibe āmāya lāge doṣa iṅhā rahi sevā kara āmāra santoṣaṛ paṇḍita kahe saba doṣa āmāra upara
GR14sadhdipu:4270: tomā-saṅge nā yāiba yāiba ekeśvara āike dekhite yāiba nā yāiba tomā lāgi pratijā-sevā-tyāga-doṣa tāra āmi bhāgīṛ
GR14sadhdipu:4271: eta bali paṇḍita-gosāi pṛthak calilā kaṭaka āsi prabhu tāṅre saṅge ānāilā
GR14sadhdipu:4274: tāṅhāra caritre prabhu antare santoṣa tāṅhāra hāte dhari kahe kari praṇaya-roṣa
GR14sadhdipu:4275: pratijā sevā chāḍibe e tomāra uddeśa se siddha ha-ila chāḍi āilā dūra deśa āmāra saṅge rahite cāha vācha nija-sukha
GR14sadhdipu:4276: tomāra dui dharma yāya āmāra haya duḥkha mora sukha cāha yadi nīlācale cala āmāra śapatha yadi āra kichu bala eta bali mahāprabhu naukāte caḍilā mūrcchita hañā paṇḍita tathāi paḍilā paṇḍite laā yāite sārvabhaume ājā dilā bhaṭṭācārya kahe uṭha aiche prabhura līlā tumi jāna kṛṣṇa nija-pratijā chāḍilā bhakta kṛpā-vaśe bhīṣmera pratijā rākhilā
GR14sadhdipu:4277: tathā hi sva-nigamam apahāya mat-pratijñāmṛtam adhikartum (BhP 1.9.37) ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:4281: paṇḍitera sane tāra mana phirigela kiśora-gopāla-upāsanāya mana dila paṇḍitera ṭhāñi cāhe mantrādi śikhite paṇḍita kahe ei karma nahe āmā haite āmi paratantra āmāra prabhu gauracandra
GR14sadhdipu:4282: tāṅra ājñā vinā āmi nā ha-i svatantra'
GR14sadhdipu:4283: tumi ye āmāra ṭhāñi kara āgamana tāhātei prabhu more dena olāhanaṛ ei-mata bhaṭṭera katheka dina gela śeṣe yadi prabhu tāre suprasanna haila nimantraṇera dine paṇḍite bolāilā svarūpa jagadānanda govinde pāṭhāilā pathe paṇḍitere svarūpa kahena vacana
GR14sadhdipu:4284: parīkṣite prabhu tomāre kailā upekṣaṇa tumi kene āsitāṅre nā dilā olāhana
GR14sadhdipu:4285: bhīta-prāya hañā kāṅhe karilā sahana paṇḍita kahena prabhu svatantra sarvajña-śiromaṇi
GR14sadhdipu:4287: yei kahe sei sahi nija-śire dhari āpane karibena kṛpā guṇa-doṣa vicāri eta balipaṇḍita prabhura sthāne āilā
GR14sadhdipu:4288: rodana kariyā prabhura caraṇe paḍilā īṣat hāsiyā prabhu kailā āliṅgana sabāre śunāñā kahena madhura vacana ṛāmi cālāiluṅ tomā tumi nā calilā
GR14sadhdipu:4289: krodhe kichu nā kahilā sakala sahilā āmāra bhaṅgīte tomāra mana nā calilā sudṛḍha sarala-bhāve āmāre kinilāṛ paṇḍitera bhāva-mudrā kahana nā yāya
GR14sadhdipu:4290: gadādhara-prāṇa-nāthanāma haila yāya paṇḍite prabhura prasāda kahana nā yāya
GR14sadhdipu:4293: eka-līlāya vahe gaṅgāra śata śata dhāre paṇḍitera saujanya brahmaṇyatā-guṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4296: sei-dvārā āra saba loke śikhāilā antare anugraha bāhye upekṣāra prāya
GR14sadhdipu:4297: bāhyārtha yei laya sei nāśa yāya nigūḍha caitanya-līlā bujhite kā'ra śakti sei bujhe gauracandre yāṅra dṛḍha bhakti dināntare paṇḍita kaila prabhura nimantraṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4298: prabhu tāhāṅ bhikṣā kaila lañā nija-gaṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4301: ei takahiluṅ vallabha-bhaṭṭera milana yāhāra śravaṇe pāya gaura-prema-dhana
GR14sadhdipu:4302: śrī-rūpa-raghunātha-pade yāra āśa caitanya-caritāmṛta kahe kṛṣṇadāsa
GR14sadhdipu:4305: loke vede agocara vāṇī aveśera veśe kara bhakti-yoga paracāre karuṇā vigraha guṇa-maṇi
GR14sadhdipu:4306: śuna kathā mana diyā āna kathā pāsariyā aparūpa kahibāra belā nija jana saṅge kari śrī-viśvambhara hari śrī candraśekhara bāḍi gelā kathā parasaṅge kathā gopikāra guṇa-gāthā
GR14sadhdipu:4307: kahite se gadagada bhāṣa aruṇa varuṇa bhela du-nayane bhare jala sei rasāveśera vilāsa
GR14sadhdipu:4308: kamalā yāhāra pada sevā kare avirata hena pahuṅ bhāve gopikāre parasaṅge haya bhorā hena bhakti kaila tārā kathā mātre se āveśa dhare tabe viśvambhara hari gopikāra veśa dhari
GR14sadhdipu:4309: śrī candraśekharācārya ghare nācaye ānande bhorā śrīnivāsa hena belā nārada āveśe bhela tāre prabhure praṇāma kare vinaya vacane bole dāsa kari jāniha āmāre e bola boliyā vāṇī tabe sei mahā-muni
GR14sadhdipu:4310: gadādhara paṇḍitere bole śunaha gopikā tumi ye kichu kahiye āmi āpanā marama kichu jāna apūrva kahiye āmi jagate durlabha tumi tora kathā śuna sāvadhāne āmi to sabhāra kathā kahi śuna guṇa-gāthā
GR14sadhdipu:4311: gokule janmila jane jane chāḍi nija pati suta sevā kara avirata abhimata pāñā vṛndāvane aichana karili bhakti keho nā jānaye yukti parama nigūḍha tina loke brahmā maheśvara kibā lakhimī ananta-devā
GR14sadhdipu:4312: tatodhika parasāda toke prahlāda nārada śuka sanātana sa-sanaka
GR14sadhdipu:4314: trailokya lakhimī pati tore māge pirīti aṅge baraye vara-veśa
GR14sadhdipu:4315: lakhimī jāhāra dāsī tora prema prati āśī hṛdaye dharaye anurāga sakala bhuvana pati bhulāili pirīti dhani dhani bhāva to svabhāva torā se jānili tattva prabhura marma mahattva priīte bāṅdhili bhāla-mate
GR14sadhdipu:4316: uddhava akrūra ādi saba tora pada sādhi anugraha nā chāḍiha cite eteka kahila vāṇī śrīnivāsa dvijamaṇi śuni ānandita saba jana sakala vaiṣṇava mili kari kare kolākuli dekhi viśvambharera caraṇa āchaye ānande bhorā preme garagara tārā hena bele āilā haridāsa daṇḍa eka kari kare sammukhe dāṇḍāyā bole guṇa gāya parama ullāsa hari guṇa kīrtana kara bhāi anukṣaṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4317: ihā buli aṭṭa aṭṭa hāse hari guṇa gāne bhorā du-nayane bahe dhārā ānande phiraye cāri diśe śuni haridāsa vāṇī sakala vaiṣṇava maṇi amṛta siñcila yena gāya haraṣite nāce gāya mājhe kari gorā rāya kāṅdiyā dharaye rāṅgā pāya tabe sarva-guṇa-dhāma advaita ācārya nāma
GR14sadhdipu:4318: āilā sarva vaiṣṇavera rājā rūpe ālo kari mahī sammukhe dāṅḍāiyā rahi prabhu aṃśe janma mahā-tejā
GR14sadhdipu:4319: hari hari bali ḍāke camaka paḍila loke ānande nācaye prema-bhare
GR14sadhdipu:4320: pulakita saba gāya āpāda mastaka yāya
GR14sadhdipu:4321: prema-vāri du-nayane jhare viśvambhara caraṇe neharaye ghane ghane
GR14sadhdipu:4322: huhuṅkāra māre mālasāṭa sakala vaiṣṇava mili premera pasarā ḍāli pasārila aparūpa hāṭa
GR14sadhdipu:4324: holi khelata gaura kiśora rasavatī nārī gadādhara kora sveda-bindu mukhe pulaka śarīra
GR14sadhdipu:4325: bhāva bhare galatahi locana nīra vraja rasa gāota narahari saṅge mukunda murāri vāsu nācata raṅge kṣaṇe kṣaṇe muruccha-i paṇḍita kora hera-ite sahacarī sukhe bhela bhora nikuñja mandire pahuṅ karala bithāra
GR14sadhdipu:4326: bhūme paḍi kahe kāṅhā muralī hāmāra kāṅhā govardhana āra yamunāra kula nikuñja mādhavī yuthī mālatīka phula śivānanda kahe pahuṅ śuni rasa vāṇī
GR14sadhdipu:4327: yāṅhā pahuṅ gadādhara tāṅhā rasa khāni atha ṭhakkura-vṛndāvanasya-
GR14sadhdipu:4328: gaurāṅga nāce āpanāra sukhe yāṅhāra anubhava se se jānaye kahane nā yāya śata mukhe gaurāṅga aṅge śobhe kanayā kadamba aichana pulaka ābhā
GR14sadhdipu:4329: ānande bhulala ṭhākura nityānanda dkehiyā bhāiyāra śobhā ke jāne kemana o cāṅda vadana niśi diśi parakāśe vāme rahala paṇḍita gadādhara ḍāhine narahari dāse hena avatāre ye jana vañcita tāre kṛpā karu nāthe
GR14sadhdipu:4331: guṇa gāna vṛndāvana dāse priya gadādhara saṅge kari kautuke kaupīna pari veda nigūḍha avatāra
GR14sadhdipu:4332: ha-ila ākāśa vāṇī avatāra śiromaṇi tribhuvane deya jaya jayakāra prakāśila ṣaḍ-bhuja dekhila pratāparudra o rase vañcita sārvabhaume saṅge nityānanda rāya vṛndāvana dāsa gāya muñi se vañcita gora-preme
GR14sadhdipu:4334: dhana mora nityānanda pati mora goracandra deva mora yugala kiśora advaita ācārya bala gadādhara mora kula narahari vilāa ye mora parama kāruṇya dhāma nitya japa harināma
GR14sadhdipu:4336: śrī-vaiṣṇava pada-dhuli tāhe mora snāna keli tarapaṇa tāṅ sabhāra nāma hena anumāni mane bhakti rasa āsvādane
GR14sadhdipu:4337: madhyastha purāṇa bhāgavata vaiṣṇavera ucchiṣṭa tāhe mora ha-u nīṣṭhā kuṭumbitā tā sabhāra sātha vṛndāvane ca-utarā tāṅhā yāṅu nitya tvarā mane rahuṅ sevā abhilāṣa muñi atihīna-jana mora ei nivedana
GR14sadhdipu:4338: kahe dīna narottama dāsa atha śrī-govinda-kavirājasya phāguyā-vasanta-ākhyāne (1465)-
GR14sadhdipu:4339: nīlācale kanakācala gorā govinda phāgu-raṅge bhela bhorā deva kumārī nārī gaṇa saṅga pulaka kadamba karambita aṅga
GR14sadhdipu:4340: phāguyā khelata gaura tanu prema sudhā sindhu murati janu phāgu aruṇa tanu aruṇahi cīra aruṇa nayāne bahe aruṇahiṅ nīra kaṇṭhahiṅ lolata aruṇita māla aruṇa bhakata saba gāoye rasāla kata kata bhāva vitharala aṅga nayana ḍhulāota prema taraṅga heri gadādhara lahu lahu hāsa so nāhi samujhala govinda dāsa atha vraje yaḥ svayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrī-nanda-nandanasya kāyavyūhya [?] śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:4341: balarāmaḥ, yaś ca jagat-kartā mahā-viṣṇuḥ, sarve śrī-prabhoḥ saṅginaḥ śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:4347: ei mata nityānanda bālaka jīvana vihvala karite lāgilena śiśu gaṇa māse keo śiśu gaṇa nā kare āhāra dekhite lokera citte lāge camatkāra
GR14sadhdipu:4348: ha-ilena vihvala sakala bhakta vṛnda sabhāra rakṣaka ha-ilena nityānanda putra prāya kari prabhu sabhāre dhariyā karāyena bhojana āpane hasta diyā
GR14sadhdipu:4349: kāreo vā bāṅdhiyā rākhena nija pāśe mārena bāṅdhena mahā aṭṭa aṭṭa hāse eka dina gadādhara dāsera mandire āilena tāṅra prīti karibāra tare gopī bhāve gadādhara dāsa mahāśaya ha-iyāchena vihvala parānanda maya
GR14sadhdipu:4350: mastake kariyā gaṅgā jalera kalasa niravadhi ḍākena ki kinibe go rasa
GR14sadhdipu:4351: śrī-bāla gopālera mūrti tāna devālaya sarva gaṇe hari dhvani viśāla karaya huṅkāra kariyā nityānanda malla rāya
GR14sadhdipu:4352: karite lāgilā nṛtya gopāla līlāya dāna khaṇḍa gāyena mādhavānanda ghoṣa śuni avadhūta siṃha parama santoṣa bhāgyavanta mādhavera hena divya dhvani śunite āviṣṭa hana avadhūta maṇi sukṛti śrī gadādhara dāsa kari saṅge
GR14sadhdipu:4353: dāna khaṇḍa nṛtya prabhu kare nija raṅge gopī bhāve bāhya nāhi gadādhara dāse niravadhi āpanāre gopī hena vāse dāna khaṇḍa līlā śuni nityānanda rāya ye nṛtya karena tāhā varṇana nā yāya prema bhakti vikārera yata āche nāma sarva prakāśiyā nṛtya kare anupāma vidyutera prāya nṛtya gatira bhaṅgimā kibā se adbhuta bhuja cālana mahimā kibā se nayana bhaṅgī ki sundara hāsa kibā se adbhuta saba kemana vilāsa eke eke kari dui caraṇa sundara ki se jāḍe jāḍe lampha dena manohara ye dike cāhena nityānanda prema rase sei dike kṛṣṇa rase strī puruṣa bhāse hena se karen kṛpā dṛṣṭi atiśaya parānande deha smṛti kāro nā thākaya ye bhakti vāñchaye yogīndrādi muni gaṇe nityānanda prasāde tāhā bhuñje jane jane hasti sama jala nā khāila tina dina calite nā pāre deha haya ati kṣīṇa eka māsa eka śiśu nā kare āhāra tathāpi siṃhera prāya sarva vyavahāra hena śakti prakāśe śrī-nityānanda rāya tathāpi nā bujhe keho caitanya māyāya ei mata katho dina premānanda rase gadādhara dāsera mandire prabhu baise
GR14sadhdipu:4359: sei vīrabhadra-gosāñira la-inu śaraṇa yāṅhāra prasāde haya abhīṣṭa-pūraṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4361: caitanya-gosāñira bhakta rahe tāṅra pāśa nityānande ājñā dila yabe gauḍe yāite mahāprabhu ei dui dilā tāṅra sāthe ataeva dui-gaṇe duṅhāra gaṇana mādhava-vāsudeva ghoṣerao ei vivaraṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4362: gadādhara dāsa gopībhāve pūrṇānanda yāṅra ghare dānakeli kaila nityānanda tathā hi tatraiva
GR14sadhdipu:4363: mahā-viṣṇur jagat-kartā māyayā yaḥ sṛjaty adaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4368: yei yei bhakta-gaṇa la-ila acyutānandera mata sei ācāryera gaṇa mahā-bhāgavata
GR14sadhdipu:4369: sei sei ācāryera kṛpāra bhājana anāyāse pāila sei caitanya caraṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4371: kṣaṇeke acyutānanda advaita kumāra prabhura caraṇe āsi haila namaskāra
GR14sadhdipu:4373: acyutere prabhu nā dhāḍena vakṣa haite acyuto praviṣṭa hailā caitanya dehete acyutere dekhi dekhi sarva-bhakta-gaṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4374: preme sabhe lāgilena karite krandana caitanyera yata priya pāriṣada-gaṇa
GR14sadhdipu:4375: nityānanda svarūpera prāṇera samāna gadādhara paṇḍitera śiṣyete pradhāna ihāṅre se bali yogya advaita nandana yena pitā yena putra ucita milana kiṃ ca yathā vraje pañca-vidha-sakhī-varga-mukhyābhiḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4377: sihitayā śrī-rādhayā saha sukham āsvādyate, tathā śrī-gaura-govinda-devaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4381: tataḥ keṣāṃcit pārṣadānāṃ pūrva-nāmāni yathā-śrutābhiprāyeṇa prakāśyate |
GR14sadhdipu:4386: kalām aśikṣayad rādhāṃ yā viśākhā vraje purā |
GR14sadhdipu:4389: priya-narma-sakhā kaścid arjuno yaḥ purā vraje |
GR14sadhdipu:4391: lalitety āhur eke yat tad eke nānumanyante |
GR14sadhdipu:4410: patre vilihya tad dhīmān prabhoḥ pārśvam upāgataḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4412: tad-dhastāt patram ānīya stavarājaṃ vilokya saḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4414: tvayi kṛto mayā pūrvaṃ śakteḥ saṃcāra eva yat |
GR14sadhdipu:4416: ity uktvā śrī-stavasyānte sva-nāmāpy alikhat prabhuḥ || iti |
GR14sadhdipu:4418: gopīnāṃ kuca-kuṅkumena nicitaṃ vāsaḥ kim asyāruṇaṃ
GR14sadhdipu:4420: tāsāṃ gāḍha-karābhibandhana-vaśāl lomodgamo dṛśyate āścaryaṃ sakhi paśya lampaṭa-guroḥ sannyāsa-veṣaṃ kṣitau ||
GR14sadhdipu:4423: iti yasmāt kalau viṣṇus tad-arthe puruṣaṃ gataḥ ||] iti
GR14sadhdipu:4432: tyaktvā svargopamaṃ sadya prayāge taṃ dadarśa ha ||
GR14sadhdipu:4436: sañcārya śaktiṃ svāṃ tasmin kṛpayā karuṇā-nidhiḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4437: punas taṃ kathayāmāsa gaccha tvaṃ vṛndikā-vanam |
GR14sadhdipu:4444: patitvā daṇḍavad bhūmau nanāma ca punaḥ punaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4446: na dṛṣṭvā śrī-vapus tatra cintitaḥ svāntare sudhīḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4447: vraja-vāsi-janānāṃ tu gṛheṣu ca vane vane |
GR14sadhdipu:4448: grāme grāme na dṛṣṭvā tu roditaś cintito budhaiḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4449: ekadā vasatas tasya yamunāyās taṭe śucau |
GR14sadhdipu:4451: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kathitaṃ tena he yate duḥkhito nu kim |
GR14sadhdipu:4455: sa śrutvā sarva-vṛttāntam āgaccheti dhruvann amum |
GR14sadhdipu:4456: gumāṭilā iti khyāte tatra nītvābravīt punaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4457: atra kācid gavāṃ śreṣṭhā pūrvāhne samupāgatā |
GR14sadhdipu:4458: dugdha-śrāvaṃ vikurvāṇāpy ahany ahani yāti bhoḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4459: sva-manasi vimṛśyaitad ucitaṃ kuru yāmy aham |
GR14sadhdipu:4460: śrī-rūpas tad-vacaḥ śrutvā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca mūrcchitaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4464: etac chrutvā tu te sarve prema-sambhinna-cetasaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4465: militvā bāla-vṛddhaiś ca tāṃ bhūmiṃ samaśodhayat |
GR14sadhdipu:4466: yoga-pīṭhasya madhyasthaṃ paśyan taṃ kṛṣṇam īśvaram ||
GR14sadhdipu:4473: paṇḍita gosāñira śiṣya ananta ācārya kṛṣṇa-prema-maya-tanu udāra mahā ārya
GR14sadhdipu:4474: tāṅhāra ananta guṇa ke karu prakāśa tāṅhāra priya śiṣya paṇḍita haridāsa tatraiva -
GR14sadhdipu:4475: sevāra adhyakṣa śrī-paṇḍita haridāsa yāṅra yaśa guṇa srava-jagate prakāśa tatraiva hi -
GR14sadhdipu:4483: rūpaḥ sanātanaḥ śrīmān janma-janmani me gatiḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4491: bandhoś caraṇa-kamalayoḥ keśa-śeṣādy-agamyā iti yā prema-sevā saiva syāt |
GR14sadhdipu:4493: manaḥ-śikṣā-daikādaśaka-varam etan madhurayā girā gāyaty uccaiḥ samadhigata-sarvārthayati yaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4504: yad rūpāśrayaṇād yasya bheje bhakti-mayaṃ janaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4508: asya ṭīkā-śrīmān caitanyaś caitanya-saṃjñayā prasiddhaḥ śrī-śacīnandanas
GR14sadhdipu:4511: pakṣe śrīmān caitanyasya tasyaiva priya-sevako rūpas tat-saṃjñako vaiṣṇava-varaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4513: āyatiṃ niyatiṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim |
GR14sadhdipu:4514: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vāco bhagavān iti || ity abhiprāyeṇeti dik |
GR14sadhdipu:4515: yathā bhrātṛ-sambandhe śrī-kṛṣṇa-līlāyāṃ kṛṣṇa-baladevau ca gaura-līlāyāṃ
GR14sadhdipu:4519: yadyapi teṣāṃ madhye bhedaḥ ko'pi nāsti,
GR14sadhdipu:4521: śakty-anusāreṇa śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-rūpa-pādānāṃ mukhyaṃ matam idaṃ jñeyam
GR14sadhdipu:4523: āji ha-ite nāma duṅhāra rūpa sanātana dainya chāḍi tomāra dainye phāṭe mora mana
GR14sadhdipu:4535: hā rādhe kva nu kṛṣṇa kva lalite kva tvaṃ viśākhe'si hā hā caitanya-mahāprabho kva nu bhavān hā śrī-svarūpa kva vā |
GR14sadhdipu:4538: śivānanda senera putra kavi karṇapūra duṅhāra milana granthe likhiyāchena pracura
GR14sadhdipu:4542: kṛpāmṛtenābhiṣiṣeca devas tatraiva rūpaṃ ca sanātanaṃ ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:4544: yaḥ prāg eva priya-guṇa-gaṇair gāḍha-baddho'pi mukto gehādhyāsād rasa iva paro mūrta evāpy amūrtaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4545: premālāpair dṛḍhatara-pariṣvaṅga-raṅgaiḥ prayāge taṃ śrī-rūpaṃ samam anupamenānujagrāha devaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4554: kṛṣṇa-tattva bhakti-tattva rasa-tattva prānta saba śikhāilā prabhu bhāgavata-siddhānta
GR14sadhdipu:4560: tathāhaṃ sā rādhā tad idam ubhayoḥ saṅgama-sukham |
GR14sadhdipu:4563: mūḍha mora hṛdaya tumi jānilā kemane eta buli rūpe kailā premāliṅgane sei śloka prabhu la-iyā svarūpe dekhāilā rūpera parīkṣā lāgi tāhāre puchilā mora antara vārtā rūpa jānila kemane
GR14sadhdipu:4564: svarūpa kahe tumi kṛpā kariyācha āpane anyathā e artha kāro nāhi haya jñāna tumi pūrve kṛpā kariyācha kari anumāne prabhu kahe mohe ihoṅ prayāge mililā
GR14sadhdipu:4565: yogya-pātra jāni ihāṅya mora kṛpā hailā tabe śakti sañcāriyā kailuṅ upadeśa tumiha kahiya ihāra rasera viśeṣa svarūpa kahe yabe ei śloka dekhila
GR14sadhdipu:4566: tumi kṛpā kariyācha tavahiṅ jānila ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:4573: gopīnāṃ paramānanda āsīd govinda-darśane iti ṭīkāyām-bhāva-prema-sneha-
GR14sadhdipu:4574: praṇaya-māna-rāgānurāga-mahābhāvākhyatayā saptama-kakṣām ārūḍhāyā rateḥ prapākaḥ śrīmad-anuja-varair viracitojjvala-nīlam anāvalokanīyaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4575: tatraiva kṛtvā tāvantam ātmānaṃ yāvatīr gopa-yoṣitaḥ iti ṭīkāyāṃ etac ca
GR14sadhdipu:4582: janmadaḥ brahma-dātā ca garīyān brahma-daḥ pitā |

GR14sadhdipu:4645: tat-pāda-kamala-dvandve ratir me syād vraje sadā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4653: śravasoḥ kuvalayam akṣṇor añjanam uraso mahendra-maṇi-dāma |
GR14sadhdipu:4659: tasya kṛṣṇa-kavi-bhūpater vraje saṅgatir bhavatu me bhave bhave ||

GR14sadhdipu:4670: tayoś ca dāsaḥ kila ko'pi nāmnā |
GR14sadhdipu:4703: etāḥ khalu pūrvāparair dehair abhinnāḥ śrī-vṛṣabhānujāyāḥ
GR14sadhdipu:4705: pāda-mardana-payodānābhisārādikaṃ paricārikā iva kurvanti yathā stavāvalyāṃ (vraja-vilāsa-stave)-svābhilaṣita-paricaraṇa-viśeṣa-lābhāya
GR14sadhdipu:4718: cakratuś cāparā dhanyā vyajanais tāv avījayan ||

GR14sadhdipu:4741: mādṛśīṣu mūḍha-dhīṣu sarvataḥ śubhaṅkarī mām urīkarotu nityadeha rūpa-mañjarī ||3||
GR14sadhdipu:4767: matād bahiṣkṛtā ye ca śrī-rūpasya kṛpāmbudheḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4768: teṣu saṅgo na kartavyo rāgādhva-pathikaiḥ khalu ||
GR14sadhdipu:4769: teṣām annaṃ phalaṃ mūlam anya-dānādikaṃ ca yat |
GR14sadhdipu:4770: nāśitavyaṃ na pātavyaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha-gatair api ||
GR14sadhdipu:4773: rupeti nāma vada bho rasane sadā tvaṃ rūpaṃ ca saṃsmara manaḥ karuṇā-svarūpam |
GR14sadhdipu:4776: yadi janma hy anekaṃ syāt śrī-rūpa-caraṇāśayā |
GR14sadhdipu:4777: tac ca svīkṛtam asmābhir nānyat śīghram ihāpi ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:4786: vadanti tat tattva-vidas tattvaṃ yaj jñānam advayam |
GR14sadhdipu:4790: sa tu śrī-kṛṣṇo vrajendra-nandano govinda eva |
GR14sadhdipu:4794: yat tu brahma, tad asyaiva prabhā-rūpam, yathā-
GR14sadhdipu:4799: tatra bhagavad-gītā brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:4800: yaś ca paramātmā sa tu asya bhagavato'ṃśāṃśa-rūpaḥ, yathā dvitīye (2.2.8)-
GR14sadhdipu:4811: sa tu anyābhilāṣitā-śūnyam ity ādua uttamatvena gṛhītaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4814: nopāyo vidyate samyak prāyaṇaṃ hi satām aham || ity ādeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4816: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā |
GR14sadhdipu:4817: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā ||
GR14sadhdipu:4819: rāga-bandhena kenāpi taṃ bhajanto vrajanty amī |
GR14sadhdipu:4830: atha rāgānugā sā dvidhā sambandhānugā kāmānugā ca |

GR14sadhdipu:4838: matto'sya sukhaṃ bh ād iti sambhogecchāmayī |
GR14sadhdipu:4842: gopyas tapaḥ kim acaran yad amuṣya rūpaṃ
GR14sadhdipu:4846: trailokye pṛthivī dhanyā yatra vṛndāvanaṃ purī |

GR14sadhdipu:4853: āsām aho caraṇa-reṇu-juṣām ahaṃ syāṃ vṛndāvane kim api gulma-latauṣadhīnām |
GR14sadhdipu:4854: yā dustyajaṃ sva-janam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā bhejur mukunda-padavīṃ śrutibhir vimṛgyām ||
GR14sadhdipu:4856: tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ yad gokule'pi katamāṅghri-rajo'bhiṣekam |
GR14sadhdipu:4858: ato vraja-vāsi-janādiṣu virājamānāyā rāgātmikāyā mukhyatvena rāgānugāyā mukhyatvam |
GR14sadhdipu:4865: tat sādhu manye'sura-varya dehināṃ sadā samudvigna-dhiyām asad-grahāt |
GR14sadhdipu:4867: vanaṃ gato yad dharim āśrayeta || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:4868: kiṃ vāsanaṃ te garuḍāsanāya kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kaustubha-bhūṣaṇāya |
GR14sadhdipu:4870: vāgīśa kiṃ te vacanīyam āste || ity ādeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4874: vraje madhupure dvāra-vatyāṃ goloka eva ca ||
GR14sadhdipu:4877: kṛṣṇas tān eva vaikuṇṭhe prāhiṇod iti sāmpratam ||
GR14sadhdipu:4880: bṛhad-gaṇoddeśa-dīpikāyām (125)-sarvā evākhilaṃ karma jānante ity ādeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4881: tathā hi laghu-bhāgavatāmṛte (1.5.498)-yat tu goloka-nāma syāt tac ca
GR14sadhdipu:4884: tathāpi stava-mālāyāṃ (nandāpaharaṇam) ca-vaikuṇṭhaṃ yaḥ suṣṭhu sandarśya ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:4887: tat tu na kevalam upāsanā-sthānam evedaṃ prāpti-sthānam idam eva |
GR14sadhdipu:4896: riraṃsāṃ suṣṭhu kurvan yo vidhi-mārgeṇa sevate |
GR14sadhdipu:4897: kevalenaiva sa tadā mahiṣītvam iyāt pure ||
GR14sadhdipu:4898: kiṃ ca svakīyā-parakīyayor madhye parakīyāyām eva mukhyo raso jāyate iti pūrvaṃ vicārito'sti
GR14sadhdipu:4899: ato ratis tridhā-sādhāraṇī samañjasā samarthā ca |
GR14sadhdipu:4908: kiṃ ca mantra-mayī svārasikyor madhye svārasikī śreṣṭhā |
GR14sadhdipu:4910: rādhā-prāṇa-bandhor ity atra māsayām api sevāyāṃ sad-bhāvāt |
GR14sadhdipu:4913: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi ||
GR14sadhdipu:4916: evam ekāntināṃ prāyaḥ kīrtanaṃ smaraṇaṃ prabhoḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:4925: vāruṇī-dig-gataṃ vastu vrajann aindrīṃ kim āpnuyāt ||[*ENDNOTE 13]
GR14sadhdipu:4926: gṛhārambho hi duḥkhāya na sukhāya kadācana |
GR14sadhdipu:4929: tat sādhu manye'sura-varya dehināṃ sadā samudvigna-dhyām asad-grahāt |
GR14sadhdipu:4933: tvaṃ tu sarvaṃ parityajya snehaṃ sva-jana-bandhuṣu |
GR14sadhdipu:4934: mayy āveśya manaḥ samyak sama-dṛg vicarasva gām ||
GR14sadhdipu:4935: tyaktvā sva-dharmaṃ caraṇāmbujaṃ harer bhajann apakvo'tha patet tato yadi |
GR14sadhdipu:4936: yatra kva vābhadram abhūd amuṣya kiṃ ko vārtha āpto'bhajatāṃ sva-dharmataḥ || iti |
GR14sadhdipu:4938: sarva-dharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja |
GR14sadhdipu:4940: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananya-bhāk |
GR14sadhdipu:4941: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:4943: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate |
GR14sadhdipu:4947: na patiṃ kāmayet kañcid brahmacarya-sthitā sadā |

GR14sadhdipu:5489: tasmāt sarveṣāṃ mate prakaṭāprakaṭa-līlāyāṃ parakīyaiva nityatvāt |
GR14sadhdipu:5490: vivāhaṃ svīkṛtya tenaiva līlāyā aparakaṭatvaṃ matvā svakīyāyā nityatvaṃ manyate |
GR14sadhdipu:5498: sa ca kṛṣṇo'nyo yadu-sambhūtaḥ ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5504: mādhurī hṛdi sadā sphuratān me || ity ādeś ca |
GR14sadhdipu:5506: dantavakra-vadhānantaraṃ punar vrajam āgatya tatra tu svayaṃ-prakāśa-rūpeṇa śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:5508: tat tu trimāsyāḥ paratas tāsāṃ sākṣāt kṛṣṇena saṅgatiḥ iti jātam |
GR14sadhdipu:5509: asya tu prakaṭāprakaṭe jātatvaṃ pūrvam eva likhitam |
GR14sadhdipu:5514: tat tu jayati jananivāsa ity āder vartamāna-prayogā bahavaḥ santi |
GR14sadhdipu:5522: matānusāreṇa tatra tatraiva parakīyātvaṃ sva-sva-grantha-gaṇe varṇayitvā pravartitaṃ dṛśyate
GR14sadhdipu:5524: tat tu jayati jananivāsaḥ ity ādeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5527: ato līlā-mātrasya nityatvenānukramikyā līlāyā nityatve na doṣas tasmāt
GR14sadhdipu:5539: saukhyaṃ cāsyā mad-anubhavataḥ kīdṛśaṃ veti lobhāt
GR14sadhdipu:5540: tad-bhāvāḍhyaḥ samajani śacī-garbha-sindhau harīnduḥ || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5541: gauṇa-kāraṇaṃ tu bhū-bhāra-rūpa-mahā-pāpinām asura-svabhāvaṃ dūrīkṛtya kalau mukhya-dharma-nāma-saṅkīrtana-pravartanam
GR14sadhdipu:5542: tasya pramāṇaṃ anugrahāya bhaktānām (10.33.36) ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5546: pravartayitvā taiḥ saha punar aṣṭa-catvāriṃśad-varṣa-paryantaṃ prakaṭa-mukhya-kāraṇaṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5553: reme sa bhagavāṃs tābhir ātmārāmo 'pi līlayā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5555: tasmād vrajendra-nandanasya gopa-strīṣūpapatitvaṃ tāsāṃ tu tasmin parakīyātvaṃ krama-līlāvasāne prakaṭaṃ nityam eva |
GR14sadhdipu:5557: mahāprabhuḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanyaḥ sarva-bhaktān tad evāsvādanaṃ kārayitvā
GR14sadhdipu:5561: caṇḍī-dāsa vidyāpati rāyera nāṭaka gīti karṇāmṛta śrī gīta govinda mahāprabhu rātri dine svarūpa-rāmānandera sane nāce gāya parama ānanda
GR14sadhdipu:5562: etad-abhāve hṛdi yasya preraṇayā pravartito'haṃ varāka-rūpo'pi iti vacanāt |
GR14sadhdipu:5576: kṛpālus tāṃ gauḍe prabhu atikṛpābhiḥ prakaṭayan
GR14sadhdipu:5577: śacī-sūnuḥ kiṃ me nayana-saraṇīṃ yāsyati padam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5585: prapañcāgocaratvena sā līlā prakaṭā matā || iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5587: tatra prakaṭayaty eṣa līlā bālyādikā kramāt |
GR14sadhdipu:5589: evaṃ stava-mālā-stavāvalī-gaṇoddeśa-dīpikādiṣu prakaṭāprakaṭe vartamānāḥ parakīyā līlāḥ prārthanīyā vartante |
GR14sadhdipu:5598: dayita bhrāmyati kiṃ karomy aham || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5599: tat tu pārṣadāḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanyasya prakaṭāprakaṭe sabhāsu svayam
GR14sadhdipu:5600: āsvāditavantas teṣāṃ śiṣya-praśiṣyādayas tad-grantha-dvāreṇedānīm apy āsvādayanti - jayati jananivāsa ity ādi-vartamāna-prayogair līlā-mātrasya
GR14sadhdipu:5625: tat tu śrī-nityānanda-prabhunā sākṣāt preraṇayā likhitaṃ bhavati |
GR14sadhdipu:5627: caritāmṛte (1.8.) caitanya-līlāra vyāsa vṛndāvana dāsa ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5628: evaṃ śrī-mahāprabhor mata-virodhinaḥ śrīmad-acyutānandādi vinā śrīmad-
GR14sadhdipu:5641: kiṃ ca śrīman-mahāprabhor mantra-sevakaḥ sākṣāt ko'pi
GR14sadhdipu:5645: yadīccher āvāsaṃ vraja-bhuvi sa-rāgaṃ pratijanuḥ ity atraiva, sa-yūtha-śrī-rūpānuga
GR14sadhdipu:5650: atha śrī-jīva-gosvāmi-pādaḥ śrīmad-rūpa-pādasya bhrātuṣputras tasmāt taṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5652: tasya tu śrīman-mahāprabhor darśanaṃ nāsti śrīmad-
GR14sadhdipu:5653: rūpādīnām aprakaṭe parakīyātvaṃ svakīyātvaṃ ca mataṃ sva-granthe likhitaṃ tena |
GR14sadhdipu:5657: śrī-jīva-pādasya tat tu svecchā-likhanaṃ na bhavati |
GR14sadhdipu:5668: tat tu sarvaṃ kāla-kṛtam manye ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5670: atas tu kecid evaṃ vadanti śrī-jīva-pādas tu bhrātuṣputra eva śiṣyaś ca |
GR14sadhdipu:5673: tasmāt brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravo guhyam apy uta (1.1.8)
GR14sadhdipu:5679: anyeṣu tu parakīyātvam upadiṣṭam iti gurutaraṃ viruddhaṃ syāt |
GR14sadhdipu:5685: jīva-gosvāmi-pāda-gaṇa-madhye kvacit kvacid guru-viruddham āścaryaṃ dṛśyate |
GR14sadhdipu:5686: yato'dyāpi teṣu santāneṣu evaṃ śiṣyeṣu sva-sva-grantheṣu prakaṭe'prakaṭe
GR14sadhdipu:5688: tasmāt śrīman-mahāprabhos tat-pārṣadādīnāṃ ca parakīyātvam eva matam |
GR14sadhdipu:5689: śrīmaj-jīva-pādena tu yat svakīyātvaṃ likhitam tat parecchayaiva |
GR14sadhdipu:5694: yad etat tu mayā kṣudratareṇa taralāyitaṃ |
GR14sadhdipu:5700: ataeva śrīmad-rūpa-sanātana-pādādīnāṃ grantheṣu kutra kutrāpi chedanādikaṃ kṛtam |
GR14sadhdipu:5703: śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe yad etat tu mayā kṣudratameṇa taralāyitam |
GR14sadhdipu:5708: abuddhyā buddhyā vā yad iha mayakālekhi sahasā
GR14sadhdipu:5709: tathī̀a yad vācchedi dvayam api saheran param api |
GR14sadhdipu:5710: aho kiṃ vā yad yan manasi mama visphoritam abhūd ambhobhis tan mātraṃ yadi balam alaṃ śaṅkita-kulaiḥ
GR14sadhdipu:5714: ubhayatra mama mitraṃ sa bhavatu gopāla-dāsākhyaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5717: bhavatu samantād eṣā nāmnā gopāla-campūr yā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5719: svecchayā likhitaṃ kiñcit kiñcid atra parecchayā |
GR14sadhdipu:5720: yat pūrvāpara-sambandhaṃ tat pūrvam aparaṃ param ||
GR14sadhdipu:5727: śrī-kṛṣṇa-dāsa-nāmā brāhmaṇo gauḍīyaḥ śrīmaj-jīva-vidyādhyayane śiṣyaḥ, na tu mantra-śiṣyaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:5732: tasmāt teṣv aprakaṭeṣu svādhikārecchayā tan-mantra-śiṣyatva-prakaṭanaṃ kṛṣṇa-dāsena svenaiva kṛtam |
GR14sadhdipu:5733: teṣāṃ grantheṣu chedanādi kutra kṛtaṃ, kutrāpi pallavitam |
GR14sadhdipu:5734: ataeva śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇy-ādiṣu kutra kutrāpi saṃśayāspadatvena na sarva-
GR14sadhdipu:5736: tasmād ekasyāprāmāṇyenāny asyāprāmāṇyam iti nyāyāt svakīyātva-
GR14sadhdipu:5739: tu parāpekṣā-kṛtena ca parakīyātvaṃ sarva-saṃmataṃ matam iti saṅgatam | iti
GR14sadhdipu:5744: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam |
GR14sadhdipu:5745: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5756: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5764: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5767: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5771: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5775: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5778: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:5780: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5784: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau ||
GR14sadhdipu:5791: ṭīkā-abhivyaktaṃ suvyaktaṃ yathā syāt tathā vraja-vāsi-janādiṣu virājantīṃ rāgātmikāṃ bhaktim anusṛtā yā bhaktiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5794: vāsi-janādiṣv ity atra jana-padena manuṣya-mātraṃ bodhitam |
GR14sadhdipu:5799: trailokya-saubhagam idaṃ ca nirīkṣya rūpaṃ yat go-dvija-druma-mṛgāḥ pulakāny abibhran | iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5801: virājantīm iti viśeṣeṇa rājamānām, na tu dhāmāntara-parivāra-bhaktivad
GR14sadhdipu:5806: tac ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-preṣṭhānugata-niṣṭhaṃ tad evānugatyam iti phalitārthaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5810: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam |
GR14sadhdipu:5811: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5817: pare brahmaṇi niṣṇātatve dyotakam āha upaśamāśrayam iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5827: tathā ca śrutiḥ-ācāryaṃ pūrva-rūpaḥ antevāsy uttara-rūpaḥ ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5832: naiṣā tarkeṇa matir āpaneyā ity ādi ca |
GR14sadhdipu:5838: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā (BRS 1.2.2) iti
GR14sadhdipu:5840: bhāvasya sādhaka-bhaktānāṃ hṛdi svayaṃ prakaṭanaṃ sādhyatā |
GR14sadhdipu:5842: mādhurye śrute dhīr yad apekṣate (BRS 1.2.292) ity āśrayiṣyamāṇe gurau
GR14sadhdipu:5845: etādṛśe śrī-kṛṣṇa-rūpa-gurau dṛṣṭe sati lobhaḥ svataḥ eva utpadyate |
GR14sadhdipu:5848: skhalann antaḥ-phullo dadhad atipṛthuṃ vepathum api |
GR14sadhdipu:5849: dṛśoḥ kakṣāṃ yāvan mama sa puruṣaḥ ko'py upayayau na jāte kiṃ tāvan matir iha gṛhe nābhiramate
GR14sadhdipu:5853: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ || (BhP 11.2.21) iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5857: ya iha yatanti yantum ati-lolam upāya-khidaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5860: ṭīkā-ye guroś caraṇaṃ samavahāān āśrityātilola-madāntam adamitaṃ mana eva
GR14sadhdipu:5861: turagaṃ durgama-sāmyād vijitair indriyaiḥ prāṇaiś ca yantuṃ bhagavad-
GR14sadhdipu:5866: ataeva iha saṃsāra-samudre santi tiṣṭhanti duḥkham eva prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5871: sati tat-kṛpayā vyasanānabhibhūtau ca satyāṃ śīghram eva mano niścalaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
GR14sadhdipu:5873: guru-bhaktyā sa milati smaraṇāt sevyate budhaiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5876: vaiṣṇavaṃ jñāna-vaktāraṃ yo vidyād viṣṇuvad gurum |
GR14sadhdipu:5877: pūjayed vāṅ-manaḥ-kāyaiḥ sa śāstrajñaḥ sa vaiṣṇavaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5878: śloka-pādasya vaktāpi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa sadaiva hi |
GR14sadhdipu:5879: kiṃ punar bhagavad-viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ vitanoti yaḥ || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5887: madhu-lobhād yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpāntaraṃ vrajet |
GR14sadhdipu:5888: jñāna-lobhāt tathā śiṣyo guror gurv-antaraṃ vrajet ||
GR14sadhdipu:5891: yuva-dvandvaṃ tac cet paricartium ārād abhilaṣeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5892: svarūpaṃ śrī-rūpaṃ sa-gaṇam iha tasyāgrajam api
GR14sadhdipu:5893: sphuṭaṃ premṇā nityaṃ smara nama tadā tvaṃ śṛṇu manaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5901: ata etādṛśānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-nandanandanasya tathāvidha-svarūpa-prāptir na bhavati tatrāpi śrī-rūpānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-rādhā-kṛṣṇātula-bhajana-ratnaṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5904: ācinoti yaḥ śāstrārthān svācāraiḥ sthāpayaty api |
GR14sadhdipu:5905: svayam ācarate yasmāt tasmād ācārya ucyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:5912: na japo nārcanaṃ naiva dhyānaṃ nāpi vidhi-kramaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5915: nāyikānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ madhyā śreṣṭhatamā matā |
GR14sadhdipu:5916: prāyaḥ sarva-rasotkarṣo madhyāyām eva yujyate || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5920: na dātavyā na prakāśyā jane tv anadhikāriṇi ||
GR14sadhdipu:5922: māṃ ca gopaya yena syāt sṛṣṭir eṣottarottarā | iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5924: śrī-bhāgavate prathama-skandhe (1.1.8) brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravo guhyam apy uta iti bṛhad-gautamīye ca | iti
GR14sadhdipu:5931: [*ENDNOTE 2] viśākhe ! idam api alpam etat tat śṛṇu |
GR14sadhdipu:5934: vayasyasya sakala-gokula-patitvena govindābhiṣeka-mahotsavaḥ kasya vā garvaṃ na khalu kharvayati ? ||326||
GR14sadhdipu:5935: [*ENDNOTE 3] The actual lines from Mukundāṣṭakam are priyam iva kila
GR14sadhdipu:5936: varṇaṃ rāga-yuktaṃ priyāyāḥ praṇayatu mama netrābhīṣṭa-pūrtiṃ mukundaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5937: [*ENDNOTE 4] These are two lines of a śārdūla-vikrīḍita verse. The rest is not found in the text. The source of these verses is unknown at this time.
GR14sadhdipu:5943: [*ENDNOTE 10] The readings on these verses are at quite great variance from the
GR14sadhdipu:5944: edition of Bṛhad-bhāgavatāmṛtam I have in my possession.

GR14sadhdipu:5949: [*ENDNOTE 12] This verse is not found in BhaktiS. Padma-purāṇa 5.82.8.
